column4: for thou hast heard the words of my mouth. I will sing praise to thee in the sight of the angels.

column1: 2 ^ I will worship towards thy holy temple
column2: and I will give glory to thy name
column3: for thy mercy and for thy truth~; for thou hast magnified thy holy name above all.

column1: 3 ^ In what day soever I shall call upon thee
column2: hear me~; thou shalt multiply strength in my soul.

column1: 4 ^ May all the kings of the earth give glory to thee
column2: for they have heard all the words of thy mouth.

column1: 5 ^ And let them sing in the ways of the Lord
column2: for great is the glory of the Lord~;
and looketh on the low things
column3: and the high things he knoweth afar off.

column1: 7 ^ If I shall walk in the midst of tribulation
column2: thou wilt quicken me~; thou hast stretched forth thy hand against the wrath of my enemies
column3: and thy right hand hath saved me.

column1: 8 ^ The Lord will repay for me. O Lord
column2: thy mercy endureth for ever~; despise not the works of thy hands.
